definition: to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)
person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to screen/to block (sth or sb)/to shield/(protective) shield
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan

sentences.english: New lock screen features - the ability to access camera and notifications.
sentences.chinese: 新的锁屏功能，同时也可链接到相机和各种通知。

sentences.english: Accessories would include fabric paint and pre-made screens.
sentences.chinese: 配件包括织物颜料和预制屏。

sentences.english: Rear projection screens use lenticular lens films as light dispersing components.
sentences.chinese: 一种背投屏，它把双面凸状透镜膜作光色散元件。

sentences.english: An analysis system for screen space property of high resolution display tube is presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍高分辨率显示管屏空间特性分析系统。

sentences.english: A soldering glass for sealing the panel and funnel of colored TV tube has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制成一种焊料玻璃，用于彩色显象管屏与锥的封接。

sentences.english: Definitely more expensive than resistive screens, by between 10% and 50%, depending on who you talk to.
sentences.chinese: 不同厂商的电容屏价格比电阻屏贵10%到50%。

sentences.english: Now they have removed one idea of Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 现在，他们屏除了过去有关佛陀的一些想法。

sentences.english: The conference rooms have a presentation screen for displaying shared documents.
sentences.chinese: 会议室有一个用来显示共享文档的展示屏。

sentences.english: For the high order generalized screen propagator prestack depth migration, the more the order is the better the result we get.
sentences.chinese: 高阶广义屏算子随其阶数的增多，其精度也将越高。

sentences.english: The ultraviolet light is then converted to visible light by phosphors on the surface of the discharge tube.
sentences.chinese: 紫外线通过放电管屏面上的荧光粉转变成可见光。

sentences.english: The truncated double conical wake shield facility has been studied in theory in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上对截头双圆锥分子屏进行研究。

sentences.english: Wired's use of touchscreen functionality and interactivity is a start.
sentences.chinese: 《连线》对触屏和互动性的利用只是一个开始。

sentences.english: Overhead projectors require a projection screen to be set up in the front of the room.
sentences.chinese: 使用高射投影仪，需要在会议室前方安装投影屏。

sentences.english: Mango features a touch screen for input.
sentences.chinese: 芒果拥有一个触摸输入屏。

sentences.english: Unlike e-ink screens, LCDs need a lot of energy.
sentences.chinese: 和电子墨水屏不同，LCD屏耗电量很大。

sentences.english: Unlike e-ink screens, LCDs need a lot of energy.
sentences.chinese: 和电子墨水屏不同，LCD屏耗电量很大。

definition: inch (unit of length equal to 2.54 cm.)
